suppress.notes: "web_project:web" is a generic/placeholder CPE that frequently gets assigned to many Java web artifacts. It is not a meaningful product identifier for our purposes, so we suppress it globally to reduce report noise.
Various Jakarta artifacts are being incorrectly mapped to the generic CPE "oracle:projects" with Low confidence. Suppress this noisy identifier for Jakarta group artifacts.
Jackson artifacts are sometimes mapped to the umbrella CPE "fasterxml:jackson-modules-java8" with Low confidence. Suppress this noisy identifier for the affected Jackson artifacts.

spring-ws-core is sometimes mapped to the CPE "pivotal_software:spring_web_services" with Low confidence. This is a noisy/legacy identifier; suppress it only for Spring-WS artifacts at 4.1.2 used by this project.
